snippet.title: Which has a greater inertia a pencil or a bowling ball?
snippet.description: A bowling ball would have a greater amount of inertia than a pencil.

snippet.title: What are the units of rotational inertia?
snippet.description: Rotational inertia is expressed in Newton meters, or kg m2/s2. !

snippet.description: Yes without gravity there can certainly still be inertia. !
